AbbyMod:Abby_NP.NAME: Qliphoth Rhizome
AbbyMod:Abby_NP.DESCRIPTION: Purge. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain a abbymod:Keyhole.

AbbyMod:Ab_Defend.NAME: Defend
AbbyMod:Ab_Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times. NL X can only go up to 3.

AbbyMod:ChocoKey.NAME: Choco Key
AbbyMod:ChocoKey.DESCRIPTION: abbymod:Key_Item. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

AbbyMod:DemonPancake.NAME: Demon Pancake
AbbyMod:DemonPancake.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! abbmod:Keyhole.
AbbyMod:DemonPancake.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! abbymod:Keyhole.

AbbyMod:FamiliarShield.NAME: Familiar Shield
AbbyMod:FamiliarShield.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Gain !B! Block. NL If you have less than !M! Plated Armor, set it to !M!.

AbbyMod:ForeheadBeam.NAME: Forehead Beam
AbbyMod:ForeheadBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies. NL Gain 3 abbymod:Madness.

AbbyMod:Keyblade.NAME: Keyblade
AbbyMod:Keyblade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.

AbbyMod:OldOneLimb.NAME: Old One's Limb
AbbyMod:OldOneLimb.DESCRIPTION: While you have Frail, if you gain Weak or Vulnerable, they are denied from being applied and you gain !M! Block next turn.

AbbyMod:SanityCheck.NAME: Sanity Check
AbbyMod:SanityCheck.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile. Reduce its cost by 2 for this combat.

AbbyMod:TeddyBear.NAME: Teddy Bear
AbbyMod:TeddyBear.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Lose current abbymod:Madness stacks and heal 10 HP.
AbbyMod:TeddyBear.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Exhaust. NL Lose current abbymod:Madness stacks and heal 10 HP.

AbbyMod:Thflth.NAME: Thflthkh'ngha
AbbyMod:Thflth.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 3 Strength. NL Gain 3 abbymod:Madness. NL Convert abbymod:Keyhole stacks into [E] .

AbbyMod:Ygna.NAME: Ygnaiih
AbbyMod:Ygna.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 2 Dexterity. NL Gain 3 abbymod:Madness. NL Convert abbymod:Keyhole stacks into [E] .

AbbyMod:PrayerOfFaith.NAME: Prayer of Faith
AbbyMod:PrayerOfFaith.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn gain 2 Strength and 1 Dexterity.

AbbyMod:Takeuchi.NAME: Takeuchi
AbbyMod:Takeuchi.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card, put 2 copies of it in your hand.

AbbyMod:Kinoko.NAME: Kinoko
AbbyMod:Kinoko.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard your hand, draw !M! cards.

AbbyMod:Meteo.NAME: Meteo
AbbyMod:Meteo.DESCRIPTION: Retain your hand this turn. NL Increase the cost of this card by 1 this combat.

AbbyMod:FlyingMascot.NAME: Flying Mascot
AbbyMod:FlyingMascot.DESCRIPTION: Remove your Regen. NL Gain !M! Regen.

AbbyMod:SweetPancakes.NAME: Sweet Pancakes!
AbbyMod:SweetPancakes.DESCRIPTION: Fleeting. NL Increase your Max HP by !M! .

AbbyMod:RecklessSlam.NAME: Reckless Slam
AbbyMod:RecklessSlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, apply !M! Weak to yourself.

AbbyMod:BadGirl.NAME: Bad Girl
AbbyMod:BadGirl.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength, you lose 1 Dexterity.

AbbyMod:SilverKey.NAME: Silver Key
AbbyMod:SilverKey.DESCRIPTION: abbymod:Key_Item. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

AbbyMod:ExposeNavel.NAME: Expose Navel
AbbyMod:ExposeNavel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Apply !M! Weak.

AbbyMod:LiftSkirt.NAME: Lift Skirt
AbbyMod:LiftSkirt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Put a card from your Exhaust pile into your hand.

AbbyMod:InsaneStrike.NAME: Insane Strike
AbbyMod:InsaneStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Apply 2 Frail and 1 Weak to yourself.

AbbyMod:AlignStars.NAME: Align Stars
AbbyMod:AlignStars.DESCRIPTION: Gain a countdown of !M! turns, end every turn while it's active with 0 energy to gain 5 Strength and 2 Dexterity.

AbbyMod:BlackKey.NAME: Black Key
AbbyMod:BlackKey.DESCRIPTION: abbymod:Key_Item. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

AbbyMod:MysteryKey.NAME: ??? Key
AbbyMod:MysteryKey.DESCRIPTION: abbymod:Key_Item. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

AbbyMod:SlimyBody.NAME: Slimy Body
AbbyMod:SlimyBody.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Gain 1 Intangible. NL Add !M! slimed status to your hand.

AbbyMod:VoidPriest.NAME: Hafh'drn
AbbyMod:VoidPriest.DESCRIPTION: Block is no longer removed at the start of your turn. NL Whenever you play a card Exhaust it.
AbbyMod:VoidPriest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Block is no longer removed at the start of your turn. NL Whenever you play a card Exhaust it. NL Gain !B! Block.

AbbyMod:VoidHeretic.NAME: Hlirgh
AbbyMod:VoidHeretic.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and 8 abbymod:Madness. NL Apply 12 Vulnerable and Frail to yourself.

AbbyMod:VoidWhispers.NAME: Whispers...
AbbyMod:VoidWhispers.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn gain abbymod:Madness equals your energy.

AbbyMod:AbsoluteCorruption.NAME: Absolute Corruption
AbbyMod:AbsoluteCorruption.DESCRIPTION: Become Confused and draw one extra card every turn.

AbbyMod:MindCleanse.NAME: Mind Cleanse
AbbyMod:MindCleanse.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times. NL Lose abbymod:Keyhole stacks.

AbbyMod:PowerGamer.NAME: Power Gamer
AbbyMod:PowerGamer.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Gain !M! abbymod:Madness.

AbbyMod:MeltBrain.NAME: Melt Brain
AbbyMod:MeltBrain.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust, Retain. NL Gain !M! (fixed) Block. NL If you have Weak, Vulnerable or Frail, repeat this plus draw a card (for each one).

AbbyMod:HeroCreationA.NAME: Hero Creation A
AbbyMod:HeroCreationA.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Gain 4 Strength, at the end of the turn lose 3 Strength.

AbbyMod:WorldStrongest.NAME: World's Strongest
AbbyMod:WorldStrongest.DESCRIPTION: Fleeting. NL Gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity.

AbbyMod:HolidayWishes.NAME: Holiday Wishes
AbbyMod:HolidayWishes.DESCRIPTION: Grave. NL Startup: Lose [E] . NL Gain 2 Strength and 2 Dexterity.

AbbyMod:LifeSentence.NAME: Life Sentence
AbbyMod:LifeSentence.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies and apply 99 Weak to them.

AbbyMod:PreciousMemories.NAME: Precious Memories
AbbyMod:PreciousMemories.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Gain !M! stacks of abbymod:Keyhole, if you had no stacks, also gain 2 [E] .
AbbyMod:PreciousMemories.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate, Exhaust. NL Gain !M! stacks of abbymod:Keyhole, if you had no stacks also gain 2 [E] .

AbbyMod:SuperMuscular.NAME: Super Muscular
AbbyMod:SuperMuscular.DESCRIPTION: Grave. NL Gain 5 abbymod:Madness. NL Gain 1 Strength.
AbbyMod:SuperMuscular.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain 5 abbymod:Madness. NL Gain 1 Strength.

AbbyMod:WormHole.NAME: Wormhole
AbbyMod:WormHole.DESCRIPTION: At the end of every turn place a card from the discard pile on top of the draw pile.

AbbyMod:CosmicSpark.NAME: Cosmic Spark
AbbyMod:CosmicSpark.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay, Exhaust. NL Startup: Add a Qliphoth Rhizome to your hand. NL Gain 3 Temporary_HP.

AbbyMod:Ab_PuppyEyes.NAME: Puppy Eyes
AbbyMod:Ab_PuppyEyes.DESCRIPTION: Innate, Retain, Purge. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Apply 2 Frail to yourself.

AbbyMod:Ab_DarkestPact.NAME: Darkest Pact
AbbyMod:Ab_DarkestPact.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Frail to yourself. After !M! turns gain 5 Dexterity.

AbbyMod:Ab_OldOneTrigger.NAME: Old One Trigger
AbbyMod:Ab_OldOneTrigger.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Plated Armor. NL After 3 turns remove all Plated Armor.

AbbyMod:Ab_SwirlOfMadness.NAME: Swirl of Madness
AbbyMod:Ab_SwirlOfMadness.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Repeat once for every stack of abbymod:Keyhole.

AbbyMod:Ab_FiveStars.NAME: Five Stars
AbbyMod:Ab_FiveStars.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies twice. NL If you have exactly 5 [E] , gain 2 [E] and increase this card damage by 5 this combat.

AbbyMod:AceInTheHole.NAME: Ace in the Hole
AbbyMod:AceInTheHole.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, if you have Frail deal twice as much.

AbbyMod:FarAwayFriend.NAME: Far Away Friend
AbbyMod:FarAwayFriend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary_HP. NL Gain 1 additional Temporary_HP for every stack of abbymod:Keyhole.

AbbyMod:FatalEntropy.NAME: Fatal Entropy
AbbyMod:FatalEntropy.DESCRIPTION: Startup: At the start of every turn, reduce the cost of the top card on your draw pile by 2 this combat and lose 1 Dexterity. NL Gain 1 Dexterity.

AbbyMod:AttoSecond.NAME: Attosecond
AbbyMod:AttoSecond.DESCRIPTION: Exhaustive: 3. NL Deal !D! damage. NL After using this card reduce its cost for 1 this combat.

AbbyMod:StarRadiance.NAME: Star Radiance
AbbyMod:StarRadiance.DESCRIPTION: Purge. NL Startup: Gain Block equals to Counter. NL Gain !B! Block, increase Counter by one for each Star Radiance played this run up to 10. ( !M! )

AbbyMod:GudaGudaParticle.NAME: GUDAGUDA Particles
AbbyMod:GudaGudaParticle.DESCRIPTION: Exhaustive: 2. NL Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile and add a copy of it to your hand.
AbbyMod:GudaGudaParticle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaustive: 3. NL Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile and add a copy of it to your hand.

AbbyMod:Memocide.NAME: Memocide
AbbyMod:Memocide.DESCRIPTION: Innate, Exhaust. NL Scry !M! , afterwards Exhaust your discard pile.

AbbyMod:CloneArmy.NAME: Clone Army
AbbyMod:CloneArmy.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards. NL Add a Clone Army to your draw pile.
AbbyMod:CloneArmy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards. NL Add a Clone Army to your discard pile.

AbbyMod:EquivalentExchange.NAME: Equivalent Exchange
AbbyMod:EquivalentExchange.DESCRIPTION: Purge. NL Exhaust the top card in your draw pile. NL Put a card from your Exhaust pile into your hand.
AbbyMod:EquivalentExchange.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust the top card in your draw pile. NL Put a card from your Exhaust pile into your hand.
